name: 陳政順
objective: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同方法分析(如能量法及Castigliano定理)、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等以及實例分析。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Reliability and Material selection
3. Load and stress analysis(i)
4. Load and stress analysis(ii)
5. Deflection and stiffness(i)
6. Deflection and stiffness (ii)
7. Failure resulting from static loading
8. Fatigue failure resulting from variable loading (i)
9. Midterm
10. Fatigue failure resulting from variable loading (ii)
11. Fatigue failure resulting from variable loading(iii)
12. Shaft design
13. Design of nonpermnent and permanentjoints
14. Mechanical spring
15. Rolling contact bearings and journal bearing
16. Gear design
17. Flexible Mechanical elements
18. Final Exam.
scorePolicy: 作業& 課堂表現 35 %, 期中考 30%, 期末考 35%
materials: Shigley's Mechanical Engineering Design (8th edition) international edition 2008 by Budynas & Nisbett  (歐亞)
